story.iWouldLikeTo: get insight in the location of non-booked assets
story.inOrderTo: investigate where cluttering often occurs and if operators perform strong enough to prevent this. Use this information to create new parking zones or alter the service area.

story.iWouldLikeTo: ensure devices are distributed according to equity requirements

story.iWouldLikeTo: ensure operating hours are being followed, like no riding late at night.

story.iWouldLikeTo: determine the distribution and idle time of assets per parking spot
story.inOrderTo: determine if and what kind of distribution requirements are needed for parking spots, and investigate how to improve the location, size and visibility of parking spaces. Achieve an efficient and inclusive supply

story.iWouldLikeTo: collect trips along a corridor in conjunction with other vehicle data (eg, Waze)
story.inOrderTo: reduce emissions over time

story.iWouldLikeTo: investigate and validate complaints from residents about parking.
story.inOrderTo: apply prevention in the right places.

story.iWouldLikeTo: know the number of transit assets arriving and departing from a public transport hub
story.inOrderTo: use this information for modelling the modal split or impact on transit

story.iWouldLikeTo: know the total number of devices and the usage per operator in the city and in adjacent municipalities/regions
story.inOrderTo: determine the vehicle cap

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish beforehand or in realtime rules for providers to implement temporary planned events, such as concerts, slow streets, festivals
story.inOrderTo: to help the events to keep their users and contractors informed and for better route planning and re-balancing efforts.

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish unplanned events beforehand or in realtime rules for providers to implement, such as emergency road closures, water main breaks, etc
story.inOrderTo: to help them keep their users and contractors informed and safe.

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish vehicle caps per provider
story.inOrderTo: allow dynamic fleet size adjustment based on policy

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish rules for providers to implement, such as max speed, max weight of carriages, slow-speed zones, no ride zones, logistics timeslots, school zones etc.
story.inOrderTo: to help them keep their users and contractors informed and safe.

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish zones, such as parking zones, preferred parking spaces, service area, mobility hubs, drop off zones etc.
story.inOrderTo: to promote safety and liveability in the city

story.iWouldLikeTo: get alerts where issues occur
story.inOrderTo: remove devices from public right of way or create plans to fix these issues

story.iWouldLikeTo: get vandalism notifications from operators
story.inOrderTo: take action against this and prevent further vandalistic actions
